markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Ashukharma (The Divine Divide)](/Deities.aspx?ID=187)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Hinder travel, create and enforce physical and emotional boundaries, build defensive earthworks

**Anathema** Destroy a natural barrier, pursue a personal relationship after being refused, betray a lover

**Follower Alignments**
N, CG, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

**Favored Weapon** [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)

**Domains** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=10), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=49)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Shattering Gem](/Spells.aspx?ID=585)

- **4th**
[Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=276)

- **5th**
[Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)

</column>
name: Ashukharma (The Divine Divide)
